author: Gino D'Acampo
method: For the mousse, place the peach and orange juice into a food processor and blend until smooth. In a large bowl mix together the cream, cinnamon and icing sugar, then fold in the peach mixture. Place this mixture into a tall glass. To serve, dust with cocoa powder, top with Greek yoghurt and garnish with a sprig of mint.
ingredients: ½ peach, peeled and finely chopped,  ½ orange, juice only,  150ml/5fl oz double cream, whipped until stiff peaks form when the whisk is removed,  ½ tsp cinnamon powder,  1 tbsp icing sugar,  1 tsp cocoa powder,  1 tbsp Greek yoghurt ,  1 sprig fresh mint
